title: Simulation Game-Based Intensive Short-Term Infrastructure Management Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and general understanding of infrastructure systems
context.additional_context: Students use personal devices to simultaneously engage with real-time collaboration tools and simulation games (SimCity 4), conducting competitive group activities based on regional planning scenarios

learning_goals: Students can design urban planning simulations with 80% accuracy by analyzing the interdependencies of infrastructure systems.
Learners can compare and evaluate infrastructure prioritization strategies in resource-constrained environments by group.
Participants can write an infrastructure management report (3 pages) as a project based on simulation game data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
